DOC.brief_summary: This trial study effectiveness photodynamic therapy aminolaevulinic acid treatment patient HPV+ low grade cervical intraepithelial neoplasia ( LSIL ; CIN1 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Aminolaevulinic Acid Photodynamic Therapy HPV+ Low Grade Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia ( LSIL ; CIN1 )
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal woman , 2550 year age Diagnosed LSIL/CIN1 local pathology ( biopsy ) highrisk HPV positive HC2 assay within last 3 month Satisfactory colposcopy examination ( visibility entire transformation zone entire lesion margin ) Meet following condition : pregnancy test negative ; pregnancy plan trial ; sexuality reliable contraceptive measure take since last menstruation onset study , agree adopt reliable contraceptive measure study Written inform consent sign ASCH ( atypical squamous cell , exclude HSIL ) HSIL ( highgrade squamous intraepithelial lesion ) AGC ( atypical glandular cell ) AIS ( adenocarcinoma situ ) cytology , malignant cell cytology histology , suspicion either microinvasive invasive disease Invasive carcinoma possibility lesion extend vaginal vault suspicion endocervical disease colposcopy Severe pelvic inflammatory disease , severe cervicitis , severe gynaecological infection per clinical examination Undiagnosed vaginal bleeding With allergic disease present ; know suspected porphyria ; know allergy ALA analogue With serious cardiovascular , neurologic , psychiatric , endocrine , hematological disease ; immunocompromised condition ; patient malignant tumor Hepatic renal function abnormal ( alanine aminotransferase aspartate transaminase total bilirubin > 1.5 upper limit normal [ ULN ] , serum creatinine blood urea nitrogen > 1.5 ULN ) Pregnancy nurse Previous physical therapy LSIL/CIN1 pathologic diagnosis Participation clinical study within last 30 day Subjects investigator judge suitable participate study besides
